activities.name: Clean up the area
activities.description: Pick up as much garbage as you can.

activities.name: Green traveling
activities.description: Use an eco-friendly way to get to the next destination.

activities.name: Nature scavenger hunt
activities.description: Go outside and have a look at nature's beauty by searching for its beautiful pleasures!

activities.name: DIY Field Notebook
activities.description: Take the whole family outside on an outdoor expedition and record what you see in a field notebook.

activities.name: What Can You Compost?
activities.description: This activity can provide answers to your main question: what household items can be composted? What can't?
